about_the_game:
Story Overview

Upon waking up, you realize that you are trapped in a mysterious and incomprehensible world different from reality. In this world, the concepts of time and space are distorted, and events from your dreams eerily intertwine with reality. As the player, you will explore various environments and enigmatic locations while escaping from an unidentified pursuer who relentlessly chases you, aiming to find your way back to the real world.

Each stage is filled with an uncanny atmosphere where the anxieties and fears lurking within your mind have taken form, and your choices and actions directly affect the progression and outcome of the story. With the constant presence of the pursuer felt behind you, you confront your inner self while getting closer to the truth.

This walking simulator offers a deeply immersive experience by blending psychological suspense with a unique worldview. In a world where the boundary between dreams and reality is blurred, what will you believe, and which path will you choose? Your choices will shape the future.

Features

  • A multi-ending story that changes based on the player's choices

  • A narrative woven with a unique worldview and psychological suspense

  • Explore eerie stages where dreams and reality intersect

  • Escape from an unidentified pursuer while confronting your inner self

Playtime: Approximately 1 hour (with multiple endings)

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains realistic depictions of violence. There are scenes involving shooting, with depictions of blood.

name: Dream Chaser

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel core i7 or ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 960 GTX or AMD

short_description: Trapped in a strange world, the protagonist explores various dream worlds, escapes from a chaser, and finds the path to return to reality.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
